channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump wanted Jimmy Kimmel cancelled. He gave him his highest ratings in 10 years instead.
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel’s free-speech fight with the Trump administration has turned out to be a ratings bonanza.

item.title: Costco’s earnings are due. The bar for growth is higher this time around.
item.description: As Costco prepares to report quarterly results Thursday, Wall Street analysts generally have had nice things to say — but some still question how long...

item.title: IRS rules now say 401(k) catch-ups for high earners have to be in a Roth. Is it still worth it?
item.description: Will workers earning more than $145,000 want to put those retirement contributions in a posttax Roth account? Their answer might surprise you.

item.title: Is Marvell’s stock cheap? This $1 billion move shows the company seems to think so.
item.description: Marvell is doing an accelerated share repurchase that the CEO says signals “conviction in the business and the intrinsic value of our stock.”

item.title: Alibaba stock is flying higher, two days after Cathie Wood’s first purchase since 2021
item.description: Tech investor Cathie Wood this week bought Alibaba stock for the first time in four years, and it’s already turning out to be a good investment.

item.title: AMP acquires Portsmouth recycling operations from RDS of Virginia
item.description: This acquisition is the latest step in AMP's goal to go from a technology provider to an operating company. The post AMP acquires Portsmouth recycling...
